mapper.select: select p.post_id, p.txt, p.img, p.time,u.user_id, u.nickname, u.head_img, t.topic_name from user u left outer join post p on u.user_id = p.user_id left outer join topic t on p.topic_id = t.topic_id order by p.time desc

select p.post_id, p.txt, p.img, p.time,u.user_id, u.nickname, u.head_img, t.topic_name from user u left outer join post p on u.user_id = p.user_id left outer join topic t on p.topic_id = t.topic_id left outer join thumbsup th on p.post_id = th.post_id group by th.post_id order by count(th.post_id) desc
